channel.title: Certs on rt1252
channel.description: Recent content in Certs on rt1252

item.title: Zero Point Security's Red Team Operator (CRTO)
item.description:
Red Team Operator

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://www.zeropointsecurity.co.uk/course/red-team-ops
  • Study time for me: 45 days
  • Exam time: 24+ Hours
  • Exam price: $568.92
  • Difficulty: [8/10]
  • Date Earned: 2025-11-10
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

I received OSCP about 9 months ago and have not taken an offensive certification since. I joined my employers pentest team recently and noticed that I have lots to learn, especially around red teaming.

item.title: CrowdStrike Certified Falcon Responder (CCFR)
item.description:
CrowdStrike Certified Falcon Responder (CCFR)

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://www.crowdstrike.com/learn/training/certifications/
  • Study time for me: ~ 3-4 weeks
  • Exam time: 30 minutes
  • Exam price: $0 (CS alliance through employment)
  • Difficulty: [4/10]
  • Date Earned: 2025-07-11
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

During my time working on a SOC team my first 6 months of full-time employment, I decided to get another credential to supplement my feedback cycle. My SOC team used CrowdStrike for investigating alerts and I had become familiar investigating alerts on the platform.

item.title: TryHackMe's SAL1
item.description:
TryHackMe’s SAL1

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://tryhackme.com/certification/security-analyst-level-1
  • Study time for me: < 3 hours
  • Exam time: ~5 hours
  • Exam cost for me: $0 (free upon release for CySA+ & BTL1 holders)
  • Difficulty: 4/10
  • Date Earned: 2025-03-09
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

This is THM’s first exam which simulates a SOC analyst’s responsibilities.

The exam consists of 80 multiple choice, then two SOC simulations each two hours long.

item.title: OffSec's OSCP (PEN-200 PWK)
item.description:
OffSec’s OSCP PEN-200 PWK

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://www.offsec.com/courses/campaigns/pen-200/
  • Study time for me ~350–400 hours
  • Exam time ~8 hours
  • Total exam & study materials cost ~$2,000 ( $1,750 exam, PG $80, HTB Academy $100, probable more )
  • Difficulty: 7/10
  • Date Earned: 2025-02-06
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

Having previously started my pentesting journey 15 months ago starting with eJPT; OSCP was a cert that I had on my radar for a long time.

item.title: TCM Security's PNPT
item.description:
TCM Security’s PNPT

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://certifications.tcm-sec.com/pnpt/
  • Study time for me ~2 months
  • Exam time: 5 days
  • Exam price: $499 (no other materials needed)
  • Difficulty: 6/10
  • Date Earned: 2024-09-16
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

This is the second TCM Security exam that I have taken; I passed PJPT a few months before taking this test.

item.title: CompTIA CySA+
item.description:
CompTIA CySA+

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://www.comptia.org/certifications/cybersecurity-analyst
  • Study time for me: 7 weeks
  • Exam time: 1 hour
  • Exam price: ~ $400
  • Difficulty: [6/10]
  • Date Earned: 2024-01-26
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

This was my second CompTIA exam, this exam was taken at the start of my senior year in university. After a few SOC interships I thought it would be good to get a SOC specific certificate. Looking back taking BTL1 might have been a better hands on certificate.

item.title: CompTIA Security+
item.description:
CompTIA Security+

Jump to sections: Quick Info · Background Info · Study Materials · Exam Experience · Exam Review

Quick Info

  • Official link: https://www.comptia.org/certifications/security
  • Study time for me: 7 weeks
  • Exam time: 1 hour
  • Exam price: ~ $400
  • Difficulty: [6/10]
  • Date Earned: 2023-07-29
  • Credential Link: credential

Background Info

At the time of taking this exam this was my first real cybersecurity certification that holds some weight in industry.

I took this certification at the end of my junior year summer internship, using free time at work to study for this exam.
